modName: Imperial Light Shield original Ancient Roman style
summary: Beautiful Buckler for your ingame use . Really based on ancient Roman Shields. Replacing the Light Imperial Shield . Make your Skyrim more and more really roman looking :-)
descriptionHtml: The roman shield is really cool in the game try it. This mesh and textures are for replacement of ID   00013AB2 Imperial Light Shield. Just Copy the files into the correct folders in your skyrim game locally. Restart the Game and your Shields would have thoe outfit of a Ancient Roman First Century \"Scutum\" with the correct symbols of Thunder and Wings like the original shields of that period. The shield design is adopted from the Roman Trajan column and the Adam Clissi Relief details.
author: VeryFluffy  Appius
